OrgName: O. C. Tanner Company and all its wholly-owned U.S. subsidiaries
activities: We collect employee data from our clients in order to administer their recognition and/or incentive programs. We collect personal identifiable information to process orders. We gather information when we conduct surveys for employers or for market research. We send offers for services and products when an interested party supplies us with an address.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: EU data protection authorities (DPAs) & Swiss FDPIC
